issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Turn on dynamic partitioned hash join

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
*Reproducer*
set hive.vectorized.execution.enabled=true;
set hive.auto.convert.join.noconditionaltask.size=1;
set hive.auto.convert.join=true;
set hive.auto.convert.join.noconditionaltask=true;
set hive.mapjoin.hybridgrace.minwbsize=350;
set hive.mapjoin.hybridgrace.minnumpartitions=8;
set hive.exec.reducers.bytes.per.reducer=1000;
set hive.auto.convert.join.noconditionaltask.size=3000;

{code:sql}
select key, count(*) from (select x.key as key, y.value as value from
srcpart x join srcpart y on (x.key = y.key)
union all
select key, value from srcpart z) a join src b on (a.value = b.value) group by a.key, a.value;
{code}

*Exception*
{noformat}
